summary: DUE TO UNKNOWN REASONS, THE VEHICLE DIED WHILE DRIVING THROUGH A MAJOR INTERSECTION IN MY TOWN. I ATTEMPTED TO START IT 2-3 TIMES AND IT FINALLY STARTED BACK UP. I DROVE A FEW FEET AND IT DIED AGAIN. I STARTED IT AGAIN AND PROCEEDED TO DRIVE AND IT QUIT ON ME AGAIN. I WAS ABLE TO COAST IT INTO A PARKING LOT OF A LOCAL BUSINESS. LUCKILY, I WAS NOT INVOLVED IN AN ACCIDENT DUE TO THE VEHICLE QUITTING ON ME DURING THE AFTER WORK RUSH HOUR. WE ARE STILL UNABLE TO GET THE CAR TO STAY RUNNING.
